page.title: 15Bideford:S+SE.Page 14 Cont.
page.content: __Cont.)with a big black sheet which has old tyres and manure packed on it so it is air tight;it is left to fer- ment then for a few months then used as a winter feed for the cows.My dad deals in beef not milk and also has a large no. of sheep.Lambing is always a very busy time as the sheep have to be watch -ed almost 24 hrs. a day. As well as a lot of land we have quite a few acres of forest.My dad has a pheasant pen in the forest where he breeds pheasants.In the winter the local shoot hunts them in his forest,in Weare Giffard and on other local land.We have just had a pond dug for duck shooting.In the woods there is Hadlow Cottage which is very old and next to the river.My brother and the boy who lives at Hadlow along with my brother's friend (who practic- ally lives with us at weekends and hol- idays as he ke his motorbike ___Cont.
